Home.title:
Have a new project?

We will boost your marketing!
Home.subtitle: End-to-end marketing solutions

HomeSecond.bannerTitle: True marketing is all about real-time data for informed decisions.
HomeSecond.bannerSubtitle:
Say goodbye to guesswork and hello to a data-

driven approach for unprecedented success.
HomeSecond.stepOneText: Vancant Group's approach is rooted in strategic analysis of the market dynamics, audience behaviours, and competitor strategies. By harnessing the power of data-driven insights, we craft customised marketing strategies that resonate with the digital community, driving engagement and adoption of your project.
HomeSecond.stepTwoText: Vancant Group offers comprehensive marketing solutions: from community building and enhancing search visibility to establishing credibility and refining brand identity, our services cover all facets of promoting your project, ensuring comprehensive support for your success.
HomeSecond.stepThreeTitle: Expertise in the Latest Marketing Innovation
HomeSecond.stepThreeText: With a team of professionals deeply immersed in marketing technologies, Vancant Group combines expertise with innovation to deliver cutting-edge marketing solutions. We stay abreast of the latest trends, technologies and tools, enabling us to devise strategies that capture attention, build trust, and drive adoption for your project.

HomeKey.title: Maximise your marketing with Vancant Group
HomeKey.subtitle: Key tasks
HomeKey.taskText1: We build and nurture engaged communities around your project, fostering discussions, and encouraging participation to create a loyal following.
HomeKey.taskText2: Our team optimises your project's online presence to improve search visibility, ensuring your project ranks prominently in search engine results pages to attract organic traffic and potential investors.
HomeKey.taskText3: We develop expert content that showcases your project's expertise, experience, and value proposition. We then strategically distribute it across various channels, including social media, blogs, and industry influencers to amplify reach and visibility.
HomeKey.taskText4: We enhance your project's reputation and credibility within the digital community through strategic messaging, proactive engagement, and crisis management.
HomeKey.taskText5: We refine your brand identity to convey authenticity, expertise, and trustworthiness. We ensure consistency and coherence across all branding touchpoints, from logo design to brand messaging.
HomeKey.taskText6: We identify and forge strategic partnerships with key inudstry influencers and thought leaders to amplify your project's message and reach a broader audience.
HomeKey.taskText7: We design and manage targeted paid advertising campaigns across various platforms, including social media, search engines, and other channels, to maximise visibility and reach.
HomeKey.taskText8: We provide comprehensive analytics and reporting to track the performance of marketing efforts, measure key performance indicators, and derive actionable insights for continuous optimization and improvement.
HomeKey.taskText9: We ensure that the marketing adheres to relevant regulatory guidelines and compliance standards within the industry, mitigating risks and maintaining the integrity of your project's reputation.

HomeWhy.title:
Why you need Vancant Group

for your project
HomeWhy.whyText1: Vancant Group offers streamlined solutions tailored for any marketing goals. Our advanced tools and techniques integrate analytics seamlessly, covering all aspects of your marketing needs in one place. With our commitment to utilising the latest advancements, your marketing efforts are primed for competitive success.
HomeWhy.whyText2: Bring us your project, regardless of size or budget, and watch it thrive. We offer flexible solutions that cater to projects of all levels. You can customise your toolkit according to your project's unique needs. Our approach ensures success without unnecessary costs—tailored precisely to your requirements.
HomeWhy.whyText3: Experience streamlined, transparent marketing solutions with Vancant Group. We work closely with our clients, ensuring clarity at every process step. Gain access to all tools and insights, allowing you to track campaign performance in real time. Spend less on logistics and more time making informed strategic decisions alongside our team.
HomeWhy.whyText4: Harness the power of real-time analytics and audience insights to drive informed decision-making. With the Vancant Group solutions, you get actionable data that empowers you to refine your targeting strategies, optimise campaign performance, and maximise ROI.
HomeWhy.whyText5: Our network spans top-tier media outlets and influential experts, granting you access to platforms your competitors may struggle to reach. With our guidance, industry leaders will prominently feature and review your brand, elevating your visibility and credibility within the digital community. Trust us to secure media exposure that sets you apart from the competition.

HomePercents.title: Learn the latest research data by Vancant Group
HomePercents.col1: New projects lose approximately 30% of their potential revenue due to inadequate marketing analytics and insights.
HomePercents.col2: Over 50% of new projects report that up to 40% of their budget is spent ineffectively due to poor targeting, inefficient campaign management, and lack of data-driven decision-making
HomePercents.col3: Nearly 70% of new projects fail within their first year of operation in the market, often attributed to challenges in acquiring and retaining users, ineffective marketing strategies, and fierce competition.
HomePercents.col4: Our study shows that over 60% of new businesses struggle with inefficient audience targeting, resulting in lower conversion rates and suboptimal campaign performance.
HomePercents.col5: 80% of new projects admit to underutilizing available data for marketing purposes, missing out on valuable insights that could drive more effective strategies and better outcomes.

hero.title: How did Vancant Group emerge?
hero.subtitle: From the start to the future

second.description: Before Vancant Group, each of us was a respected expert in marketing. We often collaborated on tasks too challenging to tackle alone. Realising our collective strength, we joined forces to form Vancant Group.

third.title: Our business track
third.subtitle:
As a new company, our journey is just beginning. While we may lack extensive

success stories or metrics, we're eager to share our business plan.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To revolutionise the marketing landscape by leveraging innovative technologies and strategic insights to drive unparalleled growth and success for our clients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to empower projects with cutting-edge marketing solutions that propel them to achieve their goals and establish a prominent presence in the market.

newTechnologies.title: New Technologies
newTechnologies.text: Continuously adopt and integrate the latest technologies and tools to enhance our marketing strategies and stay ahead of industry trends.

teamGrowth.title: Team Growth
teamGrowth.text: Cultivate a talented and diverse team of professionals passionate about delivering exceptional results and driving innovation.

marketExpansion.title: Market Expansion
marketExpansion.text: Expand our market reach and presence globally, establishing Vancant as a leading provider of advanced marketing solutions.

newIndustries.title: New Industries to Cover
newIndustries.text: Diversify our portfolio by exploring new industries and verticals to offer our expertise and services.

newSolutions.title: New Solutions to Add
newSolutions.text: Develop and introduce new marketing solutions and services to address the evolving needs of our clients and the market.

continuousImprovement.title: Continuous Improvement
continuousImprovement.text: Strive for continuous improvement and excellence in all operations for highest level satisfaction.

hero.title: Marketing services pricing
hero.subtitle:
Tailored pricing solutions, maximising

your project's potential

second.intro:
Each project is unique. We understand that. That's why we can't offer fixed

prices. Instead, we fit our approach to match your project's needs precisely.
second.title: How we form prices for marketing

step1.title: Request
step1.description: Once we receive a request, we quickly reach out for more details.

step2.title: Project Analysis
step2.description: We thoroughly analyse your project, examining its goals and market potential.

step3.title: Competition Research
step3.description: We study your competitors and market trends, finding both opportunities and challenges.

step4.title: Budget Evaluation
step4.description: We consider your project's budget and allocate resources accordingly.

step5.title: Context Exploration
step5.description: We consider your project's market position, reputation, and context to devise effective strategies.

step6.title: Price
step6.description: Based on our analysis, we propose a price for our marketing efforts tailored to your project's success.

metadata.title: How it works
metadata.description: Learn how we approach each project by analysing and valuing it, exploring the target audience and competition, and developing marketing solutions for success.

second.title:
Vancant Group delivers results-driven marketing solutions

backed by data science. Here's how we do it:

card1.title: Data-Driven Approach
card1.content: Our marketing strategies are based on precise data analysis, ensuring informed decisions and optimised campaigns for maximum impact.

card2.title: Advanced Tools and Technologies
card2.content:
• AI-powered consumer insights tools
  • Social listening and sentiment analysis software
  • Conversion rate optimization (CRO) tools
  • Predictive modelling and machine learning algorithms

card3.title:
Internal Solution for
Performance Tracking
card3.content: Our proprietary solution tracks your brand's performance in one interface. This visual overview allows us to monitor subtle changes and make timely adjustments to our strategies.

card4.title: Transparent Reporting
card4.content: We provide regular, transparent reports on campaign performance. Clients are often pleasantly surprised by the positive results.

third.title: How we turn unknown brands into success stories

step1.title: Analysing Online Presence
step1.description: We conduct a thorough analysis of your project's online presence. This includes assessing its digital footprint and understanding how it is perceived in the digital space.

step2.title: Optimising the Website
step2.description: We start by optimising your website to ensure it resonates with your target audience and effectively communicates your brand message and value proposition.

step3.title: Crafting Expert Content
step3.description: Our content specialists create expert and relevant content that addresses the pain points and interests of your target audience, positioning your brand as a trusted authority in the industry.

step4.title: Strategic Media Placement
step4.description: We strategically select the best media outlets to feature your articles, ensuring maximum visibility and engagement among your target audience.

step5.title: Natural Brand Mentions
step5.description: Through our network and partnerships, we secure natural brand mentions and placements on platforms and websites where your target audience is most active.

fourth.title: The result?
fourth.subtitle: Engaged and Enthusiastic Users
fourth.description:
By immersing your brand in front of your target audience and leveraging data
-driven insights, we cultivate a community of eager users who are willing to
participate in your project, support it, advocate for it, and share it with others.
